overview: Story of Brandy (Jeanna Fine) and Alexander (Jon Dough), a couple who meet after a mix up at the local laundry. It looks like these two are going to hit it off, once they contact each other to get their duds back, but soon there are a few easy to make mistakes creeping into the picture that leads to a few interesting sexual encounters on pretty much everyoneâ€™s part.
title: Brandy and Alexander
